title: How would the world be different if Santa Claus was actually real? - Quora

response.answer_text: How would the world be different if Santa Claus was actually real? The question makes no sense, as Santa Claus is the modern American name for St. Nicholas of Myra, a fourth century Bishop who became known for having thrown three bags of gold through the window of a poor man to purchase dowries for his daughters. St. Nicholas - Saints & Angels - Catholic Online

OK, I think we all know which Santa Claus you’re referring to. He’s the one we all know and love at Christmas time. He’s the jolly, kind and loving chubby guy with all those magical powers. If he was real, with all his wonderful characteristics( and magical powers) he could change the world into a better place. He gets my vote, hands down!!
